word:
Crossing the Red River, Texas, April 30, 1879--We left Denison April 25. Encamped two miles out of Denison, waiting for the ferry to be in a condition to cross. We remained until April 30 in a waiting position, for the sick to be able to travel and the ferry so that we could cross. We then 


                                  -59- 

started on our way with eight covered wagons and one covered spring wagon with two seats. Thirty composed our party.
